Absolutely fabulous. Just buy it, if you like true FPS games, that require practice bur never get boring, here is one excellent for you.

This Counter-Strike 1.6 is really nice game but however it's dead right now because Counter-Strike Global Offensive is out. This game might still play little kids and russians because its cheap and good. In my opinion this game was really good, but try it out yourself.

Конечно уже графика никуда не годится, но до сих пор с удовольствием с коллегами убиваем время после работы.
Always a classic. Though I miss the old days of CS, it will always remain a good memory for me.
Самая лучшая кс, сервера почти все без читеров (находит Steam сервера)
Não ha o que dizer sobre este jogo apenas que ele é o melhor FPS  de todos os tempos, ainda não existiu um jogo de FPS capaz de superá-lo em termos de jogabilidade, tática e trabalho em equipe!
CS1.6就不用说大家都知道了，有一点唯一不知道的就是那些没有买这款游戏的人不知道其实这个游戏还是有点坑，就是那个服务器啊。。。。如果你要联机，找到一个房间，你会发现进不去，其实因为那个是盗版服。。。因为天朝嘛。。。基本都是盗版服，而且有些服务器上面显示的是没有玩家但其实里面是有人在玩的，都是盗版玩家在玩，但也有确实是没人的服务器。。。所以用社区联机的话会有一点蛋疼，其他还好。
Time proven classic that will always be most fun us born in 80' last century !!!
Best way to get a nostalgia boner, must buy.
Game is great bro... too great
Clássico porém muito bom como sempre. Na minha opinião esse jogo nunca vai perder seu momento.
